featured.text: Korea and Japan 37 animal names and China likes names of gods such as Longwang (dragon king) and Fengshen (god of the wind).

definition.zh_def: 風神，指風的神靈或力量。
definition.en_def: Fengshen refers to the deity or spirit associated with wind.
definition.example: In ancient mythology, the fengshen was believed to control the winds and storms.
